title: Russia's Lavrov discusses Syria, Ukraine with U.S. counterpart - foreign ministry
text:
May 30, 2018 / 3:23 PM / Updated an hour ago Russia's Lavrov discusses Syria, Ukraine with U.S. counterpart - foreign ministry Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and his U.S. counterpart Mike Pompeo spoke by phone on Wednesday and discussed the conflicts in Syria and Ukraine, the Russian Foreign Ministry said in a statement. FILE PHOTO: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov attends a meeting with Philippine Foreign Secretary Alan Peter Cayetano in Moscow, Russia May 15, 2018. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov
Lavrov and Pompeo agreed on the need to overcome differences in relations between Moscow and Washington, the ministry said. Reporting by Gabrielle TÃ©trault-Farber; Writing by Tom Balmforth; Editing by Andrew Osborn
